translation.text: Delays due to a fatality at Lidcombe earlier. A regular train service is operating, however journey times may be longer. Please allow extra travel time, listen to announcements, check station information screens and transport apps for service updates as stopping patterns and departure platforms may change at short notice.
Blue Mountains Line, Inner West & Leppington Line, North Shore Line, Western Line - Delays

Flow on delays continue to some services up to 50 minutes in both directions due to a fatality at Lidcombe earlier. A regular train service is in operation and trains are moving through the affected area. Please allow extra travel time, listen to announcements, check Station information screens and transport apps for service updates as stopping patterns and departure platforms may change at short notice.
This service will operate as a shuttle service between Blacktown and Richmond in both directions due to a fatality at Lidcombe earlier.

due to a fatality at Lidcombe earlier.. Train services are moving slowly through the affected area. Please allow extra travel time, listen to announcements, check Station information screens and transport apps for service updates as stopping patterns and departure platforms may change at short notice.
The lift between the concourse and platform 2 is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9379 1396.
The lift between the concourse and platform 1 is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9752 8891.
The lift between the concourse and platform 5 is temporarily out of service. For any assistance, please see station staff or call 9848 9212.
The lift between the concourse and Boomerang Place is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9851 7431.
The lift between the concourse and Railway Parade is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9563 7273.
The lift between platforms 1/2 and the footbridge is closed for upgrade work until 22 September 2020. If you require assistance, please ask staff or call 4349 9110.
The lift between platform 1 and the concourse is temporarily out of service. For assistance, ask staff or call 4625 2362.

There are changes to Platforms 16 and 17 at Central Station due to Sydney Metro construction works. Hoarding for the Central Walk excavation work has moved from the middle of the platform to the southern end of the platform. Temporary concrete ramps connect the existing platform floor surface and the new concrete floor surface areas. For your safety, please move carefully along the platform and follow directions from staff. If you are travelling to Central Station and require assistance to alight from Platforms 16 and 17, please board via the front door of the fourth train carriage.   For more information about the Sydney Metro construction works visit sydneymetro.info.

The Suburban Tunnel is temporarily closed for Sydney Metro construction works. Access for Platforms 16 to 23 is only via the Northern Concourse or Southern Tunnel. You can view a map of the station here https://transportnsw.info/media/4930/central-station-map.pdf.

There are changes to Platforms 18 and 19 at Central Station due to Sydney Metro construction works.   Hoarding for the Central Walk excavation work has moved from the middle of the platform to the southern end of the platform.  Temporary concrete ramps connect the existing platform floor surface and the new concrete surface areas. For your safety, please move carefully along the platform and follow directions from staff.   For more information about the Sydney Metro construction works visit sydneymetro.info.

There are changes to Platforms 22 and 23 at Central Station due to Sydney Metro construction works. Hoarding for the Central Walk excavation work has moved from the middle of the platform to the southern end of the platform. Temporary concrete ramps connect the existing platform floor surface and the new concrete surface areas. For your safety, please move carefully along the platform and follow directions from staff.   For more information about the Sydney Metro construction works visit sydneymetro.info.
Access to and from Como Station from Railway Road will be unavailable from Monday 24 August for approximately 6 weeks. During this time, please enter and exit the station via Como Parade.

From Monday 10th August, station upgrade works will commence and run for a period of approximately 6 weeks. Construction includes the building of new ramps and link bridges. During this time there will be `stair access only¿ to/from platform 1. Customers requiring ramp access will be required to make alternative arrangements. For assistance please call Fairy Meadow Station on 02 4223 5582.

During the current upgrade of Mittagong Station access points to the station have changed.  Entry/exit to the station via Regent St is through the Southern/Moss Vale end of the station building.  Entry/exit to the station via Railway Pde is through the Southern/Moss Vale end of the shelter on the platform. Please allow additional time to access the station as a reduced number of parking spaces are available during the upgrade.

New Metro Platforms are being constructed on platforms 1 & 2 at Sydenham Station. T3 Bankstown Line services to the City operate from platform 3 & T3 Bankstown Line services to Lidcombe and Liverpool operate from platform 4. Platform 4, 5 & 6 upgrade works - A new Metro concourse is also being constructed at the Northern end of the station. While the concourse is being installed, please board and alight from the first 5 carriages of the train on platforms 4 & 6 and the last 6 carriages of the train on platform 5. If you need help, please see staff at the station. For more information on these upgrades, please see sydneymetro.info
